Conversations/Bank/Ryis/Banked Lines/Pro: Each project is a puzzle. I like to take my time and enjoy the process.
Conversations/Bank/Ryis/Banked Lines/ade: Lady Adeline keeps me busy with all these reconstruction projects... you too, huh. It's nice to be needed.
Conversations/Bank/Ryis/Banked Lines/bab: Watching the kids is fun. Honestly, they're a lot easier to manage than Uncle Landen.
Conversations/Bank/Ryis/Banked Lines/bal: Everyone seems hung up on how mysterious Balor is, but if you ask me he deserves the same privacy as everyone else.
Conversations/Bank/Ryis/Banked Lines/bat: That dragon statue in the bath sure is pretty.
Had a knot in my shoulder... all gone now. Juniper's baths are something else.
[Ari], hear that? It's the sweet sound of silence... ahhh...
Conversations/Bank/Ryis/Banked Lines/bea: Is March still talking about turning sand into glass? It wouldn't be summer if he didn't bring it up at least once.
When I was a kid, I used to make a necklace of shells for each of my sisters. I have a lot of sisters, [Ari]!
March thinks he can beat me at shell-collecting? He's never going to find more than me.
Conversations/Bank/Ryis/Banked Lines/bir: Loving this weather. All the birds are out doing their thing.
Birds woke me up this morning. Nice when that happens.
Conversations/Bank/Ryis/Banked Lines/car: Carpentry through the ages! Could be fun.
I'm thinking of pitching Errol an exhibit.
Conversations/Bank/Ryis/Banked Lines/ced: Ah, sorry. Didn't mean to put you on the spot, they're both good.
What do you prefer, cedar or oak?
Conversations/Bank/Ryis/Banked Lines/che: That's what friends are for, y'know?
March can get kind of wound up, so I like to check in on him.
Bet you worked hard today. Here's to you, [Ari]... cheers.
Conversations/Bank/Ryis/Banked Lines/din: Dinner went over well with Uncle Landen... nice.
Conversations/Bank/Ryis/Banked Lines/don: Don't let March get to you... I think he likes you, in that 'mortal enemy' kind of way. Probably. Maybe...
Conversations/Bank/Ryis/Banked Lines/eil: Hang on, I'm gonna check again.
Hey, [Ari]. I'm working on this project for Eiland, and the measurements have to be extra precise...
Conversations/Bank/Ryis/Banked Lines/fam: Mostly picked up carpentry on the job when I moved in with Uncle Landen. My family's all bakers back in the Capital. Never took with me, but I can make a cake in a pinch.
Conversations/Bank/Ryis/Banked Lines/goo: You're getting pretty good at woodcrafting, [Ari]. That's cool.
Whew, good day. How about you, [Ari]?
Conversations/Bank/Ryis/Banked Lines/gre: You're amazing, [Ari]. I've never seen anyone pick up carpentry so fast! You're good with the details, too.
I'm Ryis. I run the $Carpenter's Shop$ with my uncle, Landen.
If you have any interest in $Crafting$, let me know. I'd be more than happy to give you some tips.
Well, woodworking is my specialty. I'm sure you'll want to make things like $Fences$ and $Furniture$ for your farm, right?
I thought that might be the case. I'm sure you'll want to make things like $Fences$ and $Furniture$ for your farm, right?
Feel free to use the $Crafting Station$ near the $Town Square$.
If you stop by the $Carpenter's Shop$, you can also purchase some $Crafting Recipes$ if you like.
Anyway, good luck getting settled in. Let me know if you need anything!
Hey, you must be [Ari], right? Nice to meet you, welcome to Mistria.
Conversations/Bank/Ryis/Banked Lines/ham: Uncle Landen's been teaching me how to spin a hammer. Fun trick.
Conversations/Bank/Ryis/Banked Lines/har: You eaten yet? Here, have some of mine.
Conversations/Bank/Ryis/Banked Lines/hav: Oh, hey! You also here to relax and have a drink?
Conversations/Bank/Ryis/Banked Lines/hay: This is looking solid. Hayden did a good job picking up the outstanding repairs we had on the docket.
I try to swing by Hayden's now and then, make sure his barn's still standing. Kidding, kidding.
Conversations/Bank/Ryis/Banked Lines/hea: Makes me want to get to work on some new blueprints for more projects for it!
I passed by the other day and I gotta say, that farm of yours is shaping up nicely.
Seems like you're really getting used to life here in Mistria, huh? I'm glad.
Let me know if you ever want to hang out, [Ari]. I remember what it's like to be the new person in town.
Conversations/Bank/Ryis/Banked Lines/hem: Hey [Ari]. You know Hemlock brews his own beer here? He's always on the lookout for the best wheat when the harvest rolls around.
Hemlock's brews are getting pretty good. This one's got some kind of citrus thing going on.
Conversations/Bank/Ryis/Banked Lines/hol: I appreciate that Holt keeps my uncle busy with all their woodworking projects... keeps him out of trouble. Though he comes home with some rough puns...
Conversations/Bank/Ryis/Banked Lines/hot: Whenever it gets this hot, I always make sure Uncle Landen is drinking enough water.
Conversations/Bank/Ryis/Banked Lines/imp: Adeline doesn't just want to rebuild everything, she wants to improve it. Pretty cool.
Conversations/Bank/Ryis/Banked Lines/inn: I'm more of a light breakfast kind of guy, but the food at the inn always gets my appetite going.
Conversations/Bank/Ryis/Banked Lines/ins: I'm doing some inspections on my way home. No leaky roofs on my watch.
Conversations/Bank/Ryis/Banked Lines/jo_: Reina's ma, Josephine, has been nice to me ever since I arrived... she likes her strays!
Conversations/Bank/Ryis/Banked Lines/lan: Uncle Landen is retired, which is another way of saying he's bored.
Uncle Landen gets pretty carried away when he's out with Errol... but he always gets home in time for dinner.
Uncle Landen loves to talk himself up, but the museum really does impress me. This must have been a huge project.
Uncle Landen "retired" last year, but he hasn't quite started taking it easy yet...
Between you and me, my Uncle Landen's gives out a little too much advice. Gotta let people figure things out for themselves sometimes.
Conversations/Bank/Ryis/Banked Lines/loo: Looking around? We've got lots of great recipes if you're in the mood to craft something.
Conversations/Bank/Ryis/Banked Lines/mai: Doing a little maintenance work. Lady Adeline relies on me to keep the town in working order. I'm glad you're here to help too!
Conversations/Bank/Ryis/Banked Lines/mar: March sure loves getting worked up. It's like his favorite hobby.
Conversations/Bank/Ryis/Banked Lines/mis: Just wrapping up some miscellaneous repairs today.
Conversations/Bank/Ryis/Banked Lines/my_: My project is really coming along! What do you think, [Ari]?
For the paint job, I was thinking red? Orange? I'm really feeling autumn right now.
This is going to be great when it's done!
I was thinking of painting it, but the wood's so nice... maybe I'll sand it up and varnish it, let the grain speak for itself.
My home project is coming along nicely.
Conversations/Bank/Ryis/Banked Lines/nai: Urgh, this nail didn't go in straight. Better take it out and try again.
Conversations/Bank/Ryis/Banked Lines/new: Hey [Ari]. Got any exciting projects for me?
This is going to be cool when I'm done with it.
Think the general store might need new shingles, on the leeward side. Might have to come back with my ladder to take a closer look.
Conversations/Bank/Ryis/Banked Lines/ope: To think I'd be friends with the Capital's biggest opera singer and get to hear her up close... pretty cool.
I used to hear about Elsie when I lived in the Capital!
Conversations/Bank/Ryis/Banked Lines/pos: She thinks you're really reliable. Me too.
Man, Adeline really knows her stuff. And she's got big plans for you, [Ari].
Conversations/Bank/Ryis/Banked Lines/pre: Well, I better get signed off on them before I say too much.
Got my meeting with Adeline today. Been drawing up blueprints for...
Conversations/Bank/Ryis/Banked Lines/pro: Not bad, not bad. I think a few more weeks, and this project will wrap up nicely.
Gotta take some time to sand down the corners, though...
This project is getting close to done.
Conversations/Bank/Ryis/Banked Lines/rai: I was going to go birdwatching today, but it's no fun in the rain.
Rain was never like this in the city. Kinda peaceful out here.
March really doesn't know how to relax. Rain slows everything down, and sometimes you just gotta go with the flow.
Uncle Landen loves coming out here when it rains. He's crazy about the soup.
Conversations/Bank/Ryis/Banked Lines/reg: Nice seeing you, [Ari]. You need something, you let me know.
Woodshop smells good today, I was lathing some pine. What can I do for you?
Uncle Landen says making the sale is part of being a carpenter. So how can I assist, [Ari]?
Let me know what you need, [Ari]. I've got you covered.
Anything I can help you with today?
At your service, [Ari]. Just let me know if you need anything.
Just minding the shop. Let me know if I can help with something.
Conversations/Bank/Ryis/Banked Lines/sav: I have a bunch of sisters back in the Capital. They're always sending me care packages with cookies... I'll save some for you next time.
Conversations/Bank/Ryis/Banked Lines/sho: I try to do the grocery shopping for me and Uncle Landen. Lots of fruits and vegetables.
[Ari], hey. I'm shopping with Uncle Landen today... is he looking away? Cool, I'm just gonna put these back... he's getting older, he's got to watch the salt.
Conversations/Bank/Ryis/Banked Lines/sno: I love the snow, it's peaceful.
Conversations/Bank/Ryis/Banked Lines/the: Hard to keep up with the kids, but fun to watch 'em. Maple, Luc and Dell... they're cute, huh?
Conversations/Bank/Ryis/Banked Lines/tip: I'll hold your hand and walk you through it.
Let me know if I can give you any building tips, [Ari].
Conversations/Bank/Ryis/Banked Lines/tow: These repairs are coming along! A little at a time adds up.
S'good to patch up as much as we can before winter hits.
Conversations/Bank/Ryis/Banked Lines/tra: Balor calls me out to take a look at his wagon from time to time... it gets pretty dinged up. Guy lives a colorful life... it's not for me, but it's fun to hear about.
Evening's the best time to sneak into the bathhouse for some solitude.
Conversations/Bank/Ryis/Banked Lines/wee: Friendliness can be a little overwhelming at first, but you get used to it.
Folks help out around here, so don't be shy asking.
Conversations/Bank/Ryis/Banked Lines/win: Winter's one of those times when the important repairs really can't wait.
Conversations/Bank/Ryis/Banked Lines/woo: Not a fan of the rain. Wood warps unless you seal it, and you can't really fix that with a hammer.
Conversations/Bank/Ryis/Gift Lines/gift_: Thanks, [Ari]. This means a lot.
For me? You knew it was my birthday?
Was this for someone else? No? Ah.
Wow, look at that shine! I'm going to add this to my feather collection right away!
I've got just the project for this =Hardwood=!
You've got an eye for quality material, [Ari].
A gift like this really goes above and beyond. Thanks, [Ari].
This is cool of you. Thanks.
Hey, this is just my speed. Thanks.
This is cool. What kind of bird did it come from? Wait, don't tell me! Let me try to identify it myself...
I can always use materials like this around the shop. Thanks, [Ari].
This is so thoughtful. I love it, [Ari].
Hey, you really thought this through. Thanks, [Ari].
Wow, I don't know what to say. You know me really well.
Look at the shimmer on this! You can tell it came from a happy bird. Thanks, [Ari]. This is a nice gift.
Hah, this makes me nostalgic for my family's bakery back in the Capital! All my sisters running around, the smell of sugar and vanilla. It's nice. Thanks, [Ari]!
Oh wow, this is the good stuff! Thanks, [Ari]. Going to make something beautiful out of this.
Thank you.
Preferably nowhere near me.
You know where $Pond Skaters$ belong?
Conversations/Bank/Ryis/Market Lines/mar: =Iced Coffee= is where it's at, [Ari]... I don't care about the season.
Got attached to =Iced Coffee= in the Capital, and I was really missing it until I found Darcy's Saturday Market booth. And between you and me, she makes it better.
I like to get a bit of =Iced Coffee= from Darcy's and chill by the fountain, just watch people go by. That's a nice Saturday.
Coffee's more of a weekend thing for me. We all have different habits, right?
If you can wear it, Louis can make it. Guy is amazing.
Hunting for vintage clothing in Louis' collection is my favorite Saturday pastime. He's got good stuff.
"Style is expression"... that's what Louis says when he sees me. I think it means he likes my style.
I usually stick to the vintage stuff from Louis, but I do ask him to fit the shoulders.
Checking out Merri's furniture? She's always got the good stuff.
Back at the house, that bookshelf in the upstairs hall... that's one of Merri's. She said she found it in a land far away.
Every once in a while one of Uncle Landen's pieces ends up in Merri's shop... I don't have the heart to tell him he's vintage.
Merri stops by the woodshop every so often, when she's got something unusual she wants an opinion on. It's always interesting.
Fortunes are cool, [Ari]... they give you something to think about, or help you reframe something you were already thinking about.
With Stillwell's fortunes, that usually means thinking about darkness and stuff... but like, in a positive way.
"You came from the city to the grove, and the grove is where you'll find yourself". Stillwell's fortunes get kinda deep, [Ari]...
I asked Stillwell to do a money fortune for March, and he said "a fool is soon parted from his gold"... maybe I'll keep that one to myself.
March only ever gets love fortunes from Stillwell... he's too embarrassed to admit it, though.
Green hair might suit me, [Ari]. What do you think?
I like your haircut, [Ari]. It's so you.
Vera always gets my fade juuust right.
What if I went red to match March? Might think I'm stealing his thunder, though.
Game looks fun, but Wheedle... bad vibes, [Ari]. Not super bad... like, medium bad.
Not one to judge, but... why's Wheedle gotta smile like that? Brrr.
March is a little obsessed with the treasure chest game... well, he's having fun. I think.
Birds always fly away when Wheedle's around. What's up with that?
Conversations/Bank/Ryis/Museum Lines/mut: Talks almost as much as my Uncle Landen.
Gotta say, that $Muttering Cube$ at the museum is pretty unsettling.
Conversations/Bank/Ryis/Museum Lines/roc: Is it a rock, or is it wood? I can't tell!
I was at the museum and I gotta say, that $Rockroot$ has me stumped.
